```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(readxl)
library(pander)

library(magrittr)
panderOptions('table.split.table', Inf)
```

## Data

```{r, data, echo = FALSE, results = 'hide'}
class_roll <- read_excel("../data/class_roll_AR2202.xlsx", 
                        range = "B1:H43")
str(class_roll)
names(class_roll) <- c("dept", "year", "id", "name", "gender", "email", "cell_no")
# class_roll$status <- ifelse(is.na(class_roll$status), "휴학", class_roll$status)
str(class_roll)
source("./RnB_AR2202.R")
```


## Search for Best Configuration

```{r}
M1 <- 2000001
M2 <- 3000000
Xsum <- sapply(M1:M2, red_and_black)
names(Xsum) <- M1:M2
Xsum %>%
  summary %>%
  round(2) 
Xsum %>%
  sd %>%
  round(2)
Xsum %>%
  `<=`(2) %>%
  which %>%
  `[`(Xsum, .) %>%
  round(2)
Xmin <- names(Xsum[which(Xsum == min(Xsum))])
Xmin
```

## Plot

```{r}
hist(Xsum, prob = TRUE, nclass = 30, xlim = c(0, 30), ylim = c(0, 0.1))
x <- seq(0, 30, by = 0.1)
lines(x, dchisq(x, df = 10), col = "red")
legend("topright", inset = 0.05, legend = c("Xsum", "Chi-square(10)"), col = c("black", "red"), lty = 1)
plot(density(Xsum), xlim = c(0, 30), ylim = c(0, 0.1), main = "Density Estimation of Xsum")
lines(x, dchisq(x, df = 10), col = "red")
legend("topright", inset = 0.05, legend = c("Xsum", "Chi-square(10)"), col = c("black", "red"), lty = 1)
```

## Randomization

```{r, randomization}
set.seed(Xmin)
N <- nrow(class_roll) 
class_roll$group <- 
  sample(1:N) %%
  2 %>%
  factor(levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("Red", "Black"))
red_and_black(Xmin)
```

### 학번

```{r, id}
class_roll$id_2 <-
  ifelse(class_roll$id %>% substr(1, 4) <= 2019, "19_under", "20_above")
tbl1 <- class_roll %$%
  table(.$group, .$id_2) %>%
  `colnames<-`(c("19_under", "20_above")) 
tbl1 %>%
  pander
X1min <- tbl1 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X1min
```

### 학번 홀짝

```{r, odd or even}
tbl2 <- class_roll$id %>%
  as.numeric %>%
  `%%`(2) %>%
  factor(levels = c(1, 0), labels = c("홀", "짝")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl2 %>%
  pander
X2min <- tbl2 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X2min
```

### e-mail 서비스업체

```{r, e_mail}
tbl4 <- class_roll$email %>%
  strsplit("@", fixed = TRUE) %>%
  sapply("[", 2) %>%
  `==`("naver.com") %>%
  ifelse("네이버", "기타서비스") %>%
  factor(levels = c("네이버", "기타서비스")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl4 %>%
  pander
X4min <- tbl4 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X4min
```

### 전화번호의 분포

```{r, cell_no}
cut_label <- paste0(1:4, "Q")
tbl5 <- class_roll$cell_no %>%
  substr(start = 8, stop = 11) %>%
  sapply(as.numeric) %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 2500)) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl5 %>%
  pander
X5min <- tbl5 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X5min
```

### 성씨 분포

```{r, name}
f_name <- class_roll$name %>%
  substring(first = 1, last = 1) 
tbl6 <- f_name %>%
  `%in%`(c("김", "이", "박")) %>%
  ifelse(f_name, "기타") %>%
  factor(levels = c("김", "이", "박", "기타")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl6 %>%
  pander
X6min <- tbl6 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X6min
```

### Sum of Chi_Squares

```{r}
Xsum_min <- X1min + X2min + X3min + X4min + X5min + X6min
Xsum_min
```
